Package org.zurdavid.petrinets

Interface IReachabilityGraphView

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphStreamReachabilityGraph
public interface IReachabilityGraphView
The interface provides methods to display a reachability graph. It is part of the applications view.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEdge(Transition t, Marking from, Marking to)
    The method adds an edge to the graph view.
    void
    addMarking(Marking newMarking)
    The method adds a marking to the graph view.
    void
    hilightPath(BoundednessAnalysisResult r)
    The method hilights the path that marks the reachability graph as unbounded.
    void
    load(IReachabilityGraph graph)
    The passed in reachability graph is loaded and displayed.
    void
    updateLastFired(Transition t, Marking preFiring, Marking postFiring)
    Updates the transition that last fired, so the corresponding edge and node / marking can be highlighted.

  • Method Details

    • addMarking

      void addMarking(Marking newMarking)
      The method adds a marking to the graph view.
      Parameters:
      newMarking - The new marking.

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(Transition t, Marking from, Marking to)
      The method adds an edge to the graph view.
      Parameters:
      t - The firing transition.
      from - The marking the edge comes from.
      to - The marking the edge leads to.

    • updateLastFired

      void updateLastFired(Transition t, Marking preFiring, Marking postFiring)
      Updates the transition that last fired, so the corresponding edge and node / marking can be highlighted.
      Parameters:
      t - The firing transition.
      preFiring - The Petri nets marking before the transition fired.
      postFiring - The Petri nets marking after the transition fired.

    • load

      void load(IReachabilityGraph graph)
      The passed in reachability graph is loaded and displayed.
      Parameters:
      graph - The reachability graph to be displayed.

    • hilightPath

      void hilightPath(BoundednessAnalysisResult r)
      The method hilights the path that marks the reachability graph as unbounded.
      Parameters:
      r - The negative result of the boundedness analysis that contains the path.
